Utils¶

Warning

Most function will be deprecated in next major version.

Utils function.

Most functions here will be deprecated

uv_align_distribute.utils.GBBox(islands)[source]¶

Return the bounding box of all islands.

uv_align_distribute.utils.InitBMesh()[source]¶

Init global bmesh.

uv_align_distribute.utils.averageIslandDist(islands)[source]¶

Return the average distance between islands.

uv_align_distribute.utils.getTargetPoint(context, islands)[source]¶

Return the target of uv operations.

uv_align_distribute.utils.update()[source]¶

Update mesh rappresentation in blender.

uv_align_distribute.utils.vectorDistance(vector1, vector2)[source]¶

Return the distance between vectors.
